definition.name: NXamplifier
definition.doc: Base classed definition for amplifier devices.

field.name: num_of_channels
field.doc: The number of preamplifier channels are assgined.

field.name: active_channels
field.doc: The number of preamplifier channels are ready tp to be used. (array for active channels)

field.name: openloop_amplification
field.doc: The output signal does not go through a feedback loop to adjust the amplification of the amplifier. (array for active channels)

field.name: signal_over_noise
field.doc: The ratio of the amplitue of the useful signal to the amplitude of the noise in the output signal of the amplifier. S/N=V_signal/V_noise. (array for active channels)

field.name: crosstalk_compensation
field.doc: for reducing interferences between different signalling pathways

field.name: bandwidth
field.doc: The spectrum of frequency it can amplify, from its lowest to highest frequency limits.

field.name: low_pass
field.doc: Order and cut-off frequency of the low-pass filter applied on the demodulated signals (X,Y). Cut-off frq (low pass filter) (foreach DemodulatorChannels)

field.name: hi_pass
field.doc: Order and cut-off frequency of the high-pass filter applied on the demodulation signal. Cut-off frq (hi pass filter) (foreach DemodulatorChannels)
